label: W15_LTXT_COMM_TERMINAL_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The core triangle engine supporting this world is located in this very important place.

label: W15_LTXT_COMM_INDUSTRIAL_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The factories in this area manufacture various types of equipment that rely on triangle engines.

label: W15_LTXT_COMM_TRADE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Trigon Corporation's sales department is located here. The employees are constantly pitching their expertise to anyone who will listen.

label: W15_LTXT_COMM_MINE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A mine with a large—but old and deteriorating—triangle engine.

label: W15_LTXT_COMM_RANCH_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A Trigon Corporation facility that is the perfect living environment for animals.

label: W15_LTXT_COMM_TOWER_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A tall building that houses the Trigon Corporation's director.

label: W15_LTXT_COMM_SETTLEMENT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: In addition to being the home of countless people
column4: the Trigon Corporation's infrastructure department is also located here.

label: W15_LTXT_COMM_DAM_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: old triangle engine that relies on hydraulic power.

label: W15_LTXT_COMM_CAVE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You've heard tales of a ruin with ancient murals deep within this cave.

label: W15_LTXT_COMM_PARK_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A paradise of rides and attractions for children
column4: all powered by triangle engines.

label: W15_LTXT_COMM_FOREST_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Though this place was once deforested thanks to the triangle engine
column4: trees are now attempting to reclaim their former home.

label: W15_LTXT_COMM_LAB_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A laboratory full of cutting-edge equipment the Trigon Corporation uses to research triangle theory.

label: W15_LTXT_COMM_PORT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A port in the sky that was once filled with life. It has since fallen into disrepair
column4: and airships no longer visit it.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TERMINAL_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Are the people in the tower safe after that explosion?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TOWER_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The tower's triangle engine has stopped. Something sinister seems to be at work.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_INDUSTRIAL_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must repair and reboot the triangle engine in the Industrial Ward as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_SETTLEMENT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must repair and reboot the triangle engine in the Residential Ward as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TRADE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must repair and reboot the triangle engine in the Commercial Ward as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_LAB_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must repair and reboot the triangle engine in the laboratory as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_MINE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must repair and reboot the triangle engine in the mine as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_PORT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must repair and reboot the triangle engine at the port as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_RANCH_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must repair and reboot the triangle engine at the ranch as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_DAM_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must repair and reboot the triangle engine at the dam as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_PARK_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must repair and reboot the triangle engine in the amusement park as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_FOREST_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must repair and reboot the triangle engine in the forest as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_CAVE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: It seems even this cave is part of the triangle network. Could there be a triangle engine here as well?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_BOSS_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A ceremony will soon be held at the central terminal. What could be causing the anomaly that Master detected?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_BOSS_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A ceremony will soon be held at the central terminal. What could be causing the anomaly that Master detected?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_BOSS_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A ceremony will soon be held at the central terminal. What could be causing the anomaly that Master detected?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_BOSS_030_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A ceremony will soon be held at the central terminal. What could be causing the anomaly that Master detected?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_BOSS_040_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A ceremony will soon be held at the central terminal. What could be causing the anomaly that Master detected?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TERMINAL_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine in the central terminal as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TOWER_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine in the tower as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_INDUSTRIAL_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine in the Industrial Ward as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_SETTLEMENT_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine in the Residential Ward as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TRADE_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine in the Commercial Ward as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_LAB_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine in the laboratory as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_MINE_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine in the mine as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_PORT_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine at the port as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_RANCH_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine at the ranch as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_DAM_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine at the dam as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_PARK_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine in the amusement park as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_FOREST_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine in the forest as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_CAVE_RECLEAN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Anti-Triangle has destroyed the triangle network. Restore the engine in the cave as soon as possible.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_LAB_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Corana has asked you to return. This is a good opportunity to share all that you've learned with her.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_ALESSAAGHOST_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Fred seems concerned about whether anyone is watching him. What is he planning?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_ALESSAAGHOST_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You thought Corana was in the laboratory
column4: but apparently she's in the central terminal. Perhaps something unexpected is about to happen.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_ALESSAAGHOST_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You sense someone unfamiliar near the central terminal. You should investigate this unexpected event.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_ALESSAAGHOST_030_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You sense something very dangerous near the central terminal. You should investigate this at once.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_INDUSTRIAL_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must reboot the triangle engine in the Industrial Ward and purify this area.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_SETTLEMENT_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must reboot the triangle engine in the Residential Ward and purify this area.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_SETTLEMENT_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Complaints are flooding in about the Residential Ward
column4: and they won't stop until you get the triangle engine there online.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TRADE_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must reboot the triangle engine in the Commercial Ward and purify this area.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Trigon Corporation is working on developing a miniature triangle engine. Will they be able to see it to completion?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The developers of the new product still need a spark of inspiration. Perhaps Fred can give you some advice?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You wonder if the air purifier was successfully completed. You should go ask the Trigon Corporation employee.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TRADE_BATTLE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This new product will direct you to places that boost your spirit. In other words...

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TRADE_BATTLE_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This new product will direct you to places that boost your spirit. In other words...

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TRADE_BATTLE_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This new product will direct you to places that boost your spirit. In other words...

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TRADE_END_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: It's time to return the sensor and deliver your impressions. You can only hope this will help you repair and reboot the triangle engines.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TRADE_END_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: It's time to return the sensor and deliver your impressions. You can only hope this will help you repair and reboot the triangle engines.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_TRADE_END_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: It's time to return the sensor and deliver your impressions. You can only hope this will help you repair and reboot the triangle engines.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Can you get Fred to talk about the death of Dr. Corana Sitrix's sister?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_LAB_END_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Corana managed to reboot the triangle engine. Should you tell her about Fred?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_MINE_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Restore the triangle engine in the mine.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_MINE_GODAM_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The mine's supervisor is unwilling to help you
column4: but perhaps his son

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_MINE_END_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: perhaps you can finally talk some sense into the mine supervisor.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_RANCH_SEARCH_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Could the animals that escaped the ranch be here?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_RANCH_SEARCH_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Could the animals that escaped the ranch be here?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_RANCH_SEARCH_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Could the animals that escaped the ranch be here?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_RANCH_SEARCHFALSE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Could the animals that escaped the ranch be here?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_RANCH_SEARCHFALSE_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Could the animals that escaped the ranch be here?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_RANCH_SEARCHFALSE_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Could the animals that escaped the ranch be here?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_RANCH_END_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You managed to round up all the wayward animals. It's time to head back and repair the triangle engine.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_DAM_END_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The restoration of the dam's triangle engine is apparently complete. You should check it out.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_FOREST_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Should you return to the forest and help with the real purification process?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_PARK_END_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You successfully made the Anti-Triangle absorb the uncontrollable energy. You should return and assess the current situation.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_CAVE_GOLAB_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You still don't know where in the cave the murals are located
column4: but perhaps Dr. Sitrix in the laboratory can tell you.

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_CAVE_END_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Dr. Sitrix told you where the murals can be found
column4: but will you be able to reach them safely?

label: W15_EVAR_COMM_ANTI00_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: the Anti-Triangle will keep stealing triangle energy until it destroys the triangle network.
